Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory27.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "There are more humans on this side of Oasis. You don't have to tiptoe around here.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Breath a sigh of relief)', 3: '6'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Look at you. Why are you even here getting stressed out like that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Sir!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Done with your shift, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "That's right! About to grab some food and have a rest!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'This is...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's a friend of mine defecting to our side. We met on the battlefield before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Did the Babylonians leave you behind as well?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "But now that you're here, you don't have to worry anymore! Mr. Watanabe won't let anyone hurt you like that!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Why aren't you saying anything...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Cough—my friend here is still quite traumatized, so don't expect, erm, you know...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Ah! I'm so sorry—that must have been too much information for you to process! Please, rest up! I should go eat something as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I was just trying to find an excuse. I wasn't trying to make you the buff of a joke.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sure, things are tattered and beat-up here in Oasis, and our infrastructure is lacking...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But the people... It feels like home, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
